text.section: A majority of the members then serving on the Commission is a quorum.
The Commission shall determine the times and places of its regular and special meetings.

The chairman of the Commission:
May call a special meeting at any time; and
Shall call a special meeting when requested by 2 or more members of the Commission.

A member of the Commission:
May not receive compensation; but
Is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.
The Department shall provide staff services and support for the Commission.
